Patron Program Donors

Patron gifts are essential in helping the Museum to meet its annual operating expenses. The Museum is deeply grateful to the Patrons listed below for their continued generosity.

Ross Society

The Denman Waldo Ross Society honors donors who have contributed works of art or a minimum of $2,500 specifically designated for the purchase of art beginning July 1, 2001. Ross Society Fellows are donors who have contributed works of art or funds for purchasing art valued at $1 million or more.
